properties.description: This pipeline is used to migrate source table to data lake(RAW) with full copy support. Pipeline is using value of source name and table name in configuration table.

activities.name: GET_CFG
activities.description: Get migration table information from configuration table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [load_id]
      ,[source_name]
      ,[source]
      ,[interface_id]
      ,[interface_name]
      ,[load_type]
      ,[source_object_schema]
      ,[source_object]
      ,[source_field]
      ,[source_condition]
      ,[target_object_schema]
      ,[target_object]
      ,[target_field]
      ,[target_condition]
      ,[from]
      ,[to]
      ,[interval_type]
      ,[r_mig_flg]
      ,[b_mig_flg]
      ,[c_mig_flg]
      ,[usecase_id]
      ,[src_sys_id]
      ,[trigger_id]
      ,[rest_call_url]
      ,[synapse_object_schema]
      ,[synapse_object]
      ,[synapse_object_type]
      ,NEWID() as ID 
      ,FORMAT(cast(DATEADD(HOUR,9,GETUTCDATE()) as datetime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'
  FROM [META].[LOAD_INV_EAI]
  WHERE 1=1
  AND [r_mig_flg] = 1
  AND [interface_id] = '@{pipeline().parameters.interface_id}'

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 
            FROM ALL_TABLES 
            WHERE OWNER = UPPER('@{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}')
              AND TABLE_NAME = UPPER('@{item().source_object}')
        ) 
        THEN (
            SELECT COUNT(*) 
            FROM @{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}.@{item().source_object}
        )
        ELSE 0
    END AS src_rec_cnt
FROM DUAL

SELECT * 
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}.@{item().source_object}
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS
    WHERE OWNER = '@{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}'
      AND TABLE_NAME = '@{item().source_object}'
)

SELECT * 
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}.@{item().source_object}
WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS
    WHERE OWNER = '@{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}'
      AND TABLE_NAME = '@{item().source_object}'
)

activities.name: GET_TIME
activities.description: This activity is used to initialize TIME variable with pipeline start time

properties.description: This pipeline is used to migrate source table to data lake(RAW) with full copy support. Pipeline is using value of source name and table name in configuration table.

activities.name: GET_CFG
activities.description: Get migration table information from configuration table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [load_id]
      ,[source_name]
      ,[source]
      ,[interface_id]
      ,[interface_name]
      ,[load_type]
      ,[source_object_schema]
      ,[source_object]
      ,[source_field]
      ,[source_condition]
      ,[target_object_schema]
      ,[target_object]
      ,[target_field]
      ,[target_condition]
      ,[from]
      ,[to]
      ,[interval_type]
      ,[r_mig_flg]
      ,[b_mig_flg]
      ,[c_mig_flg]
      ,[usecase_id]
      ,[src_sys_id]
      ,[trigger_id]
      ,[rest_call_url]
      ,[synapse_object_schema]
      ,[synapse_object]
      ,[synapse_object_type]
      ,NEWID() as ID 
      ,FORMAT(cast(DATEADD(HOUR,9,GETUTCDATE()) as datetime), 'yyyyMMddHHmmss') as 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'
  FROM [META].[LOAD_INV_EAI]
  WHERE 1=1
  AND [r_mig_flg] = 1
  AND [interface_id] = '@{pipeline().parameters.IF_ID}'

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1 
            FROM ALL_TABLES 
            WHERE OWNER = UPPER('@{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}')
              AND TABLE_NAME = UPPER('@{item().source_object}')
        ) 
        THEN (
            SELECT COUNT(*) 
            FROM @{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}.@{item().source_object}
        )
        ELSE 0
    END AS src_rec_cnt
FROM DUAL

SELECT * 
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}.@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].source_object}
WHERE 1=1
  AND @{split(activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].target_field,',')[0]} >= TO_DATE('@{item().FROM_DT}', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
  AND @{split(activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].target_field,',')[1]} < TO_DATE('@{item().TO_DT}', 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT * 
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.source_object_schema}.@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].source_object}
WHERE 1=1
  AND @{split(activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].target_field,',')[0]} >= TO_DATE('@{item().FROM_DT}', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
  AND @{split(activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].target_field,',')[1]} < TO_DATE('@{item().TO_DT}', 'YYYY-MM-DD')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT 
FORMAT(DATEADD(@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].interval_type}, DATEDIFF(@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].interval_type}, 0, [DATE]), 0),'@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].target_condition}') AS FROM_DT ,
FORMAT(DATEADD(@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].interval_type}, 1 ,DATEADD(@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].interval_type}, DATEDIFF(@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].interval_type}, 0, [DATE]), 0)),'@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].target_condition}') AS TO_DT
FROM [dbo].[V_DIM_FND_CALENDAR_DATES_MST]
WHERE FORMAT([DATE],'@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].target_condition}') BETWEEN '@{activity('GET_DATE_RANGE').output.value[0].MIN_DT}' AND '@{activity('GET_DATE_RANGE').output.value[0].MAX_DT}'

SELECT 
MIN(@{split(activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].target_field,',')[0]}) AS MIN_DT ,
MAX(@{split(activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].target_field,',')[1]}) AS MAX_DT
FROM [@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].source_object_schema}].[@{activity('GET_CFG').output.value[0].source_object}]

text.value:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE 1=1 AND name = N'@{activity('GET_CFG').output.firstRow.source_object}' AND type = N'U')
TRUNCATE TABLE [@{activity('GET_CFG').output.firstRow.source_object_schema}].[@{activity('GET_CFG').output.firstRow.source_object}]
